name: Zapdos

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.effect: Search your discard for up to two Energies and attach them to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.effect: Discard all Energies attached to Zapdos. For each Energy discarded this way, deal 20 damage to a random Pokemon other than Zapdos. This attach ignores Weakness and Resistance.

flavor: This legendary bird Pokemon is said to appear when the sky turns dark and lightning showers down.
